sqlMap.select: select work_days-total_valid_holiday as total_workdays from ( select count(day_name) as work_days from ( select (level - 1) day_nr, (level + trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH') - 1) day_date, to_char(level + trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH') - 1, 'd') as day_name from dual connect by level <= ADD_MONTHS(trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH'), 1) - trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH') order by day_nr ) all_date where day_name not in ('1','7') ) work_day, ( select count(1) as total_valid_holiday from master_holiday where holiday_date between trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH') and add_months(trunc(to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy'), 'MONTH'), 1) - 1 and to_char(holiday_date,'d') not in ('1','7') --1=Sunday, 7=Saturday ) holiday

select holiday_id as holidayId, to_char(holiday_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as holidayDate, name, created_by as createdBy, to_char(created_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as createdDate from master_holiday order by holiday_date
select holiday_id from master_holiday where holiday_date = to_date(#value#,'MM/dd/yyyy')
sqlMap.insert: insert into master_holiday (holiday_id, holiday_date, name, created_by, created_date) values (#holidayId#,to_date(#holidayDate#,'MM/dd/yyyy'),#name#,#createdBy#,sysdate)
update master_holiday set name = #name#, created_by = #createdBy#, created_date = sysdate where holiday_id = #holidayId#
